questions.subject: english

content_en.stem: What is the name of your teacher. Which punctuation mark should go at the end of this sentence?

content_zh.stem: What is the name of your teacher. Which punctuation mark should go at the end of this sentence?

questions.explanation_en: This is a question (it asks for information), so it needs a question mark (?).
questions.explanation_zh: This is a question (it asks for information), so it needs a question mark (?).
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-001 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)

questions.subject: english

content_en.stem: Which pair of words are synonyms (have the same meaning)?

content_zh.stem: Which pair of words are synonyms (have the same meaning)?

questions.explanation_en: Afraid and Scared both mean feeling fear. The other pairs have different meanings.
questions.explanation_zh: Afraid and Scared both mean feeling fear. The other pairs have different meanings.
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-002 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)

questions.subject: english

content_en.stem: What is the plural form of 'mouse'?

content_zh.stem: What is the plural form of 'mouse'?

questions.explanation_en: Mouse is an irregular noun. Its plural form is 'mice', not 'mouses'.
questions.explanation_zh: Mouse is an irregular noun. Its plural form is 'mice', not 'mouses'.
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-003 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)

questions.subject: english
questions.explanation_en: The suffix '-est' means the most. 'Tallest' means the most tall of all.
questions.explanation_zh: The suffix '-est' means the most. 'Tallest' means the most tall of all.
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-004 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)

questions.subject: english

content_en.stem: What type of text is shown?

content_zh.stem: What type of text is shown?

questions.explanation_en: The text shows items arranged in a vertical format with bullet points or numbers, which is the format of a list.
questions.explanation_zh: The text shows items arranged in a vertical format with bullet points or numbers, which is the format of a list.
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-005 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)

questions.subject: english

content_en.stem: Which word begins with the same sound as 'ball'?

content_zh.stem: Which word begins with the same sound as 'ball'?

questions.explanation_en: Bear and ball both begin with the /b/ sound. The other words begin with different sounds.
questions.explanation_zh: Bear and ball both begin with the /b/ sound. The other words begin with different sounds.
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-101 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)

questions.subject: english

content_en.stem: Read the sentence: 'I can see the ___.' Which sight word best completes the sentence if there is a picture of a dog?

content_zh.stem: Read the sentence: 'I can see the ___.' Which sight word best completes the sentence if there is a picture of a dog?

questions.explanation_en: The sight word 'dog' matches the picture and completes the sentence: 'I can see the dog.'
questions.explanation_zh: The sight word 'dog' matches the picture and completes the sentence: 'I can see the dog.'
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-102 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)

questions.subject: english

content_en.stem: Read the passage: Sam has a red hat. He wears it every day. He wears it to school. He wears it to the park. What is the passage mostly about?
options: B. Sam loves his red hat
C. Sam goes to the park

content_zh.stem: Read the passage: Sam has a red hat. He wears it every day. He wears it to school. He wears it to the park. What is the passage mostly about?
options: B. Sam loves his red hat
C. Sam goes to the park

questions.explanation_en: Every sentence talks about Sam and his red hat. The main idea is that Sam loves wearing his red hat.
questions.explanation_zh: Every sentence talks about Sam and his red hat. The main idea is that Sam loves wearing his red hat.
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-103 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)

questions.subject: english

content_en.stem: Read the passage: First, Mia woke up. Next, she brushed her teeth. Then, she ate breakfast. What did Mia do right after she woke up?

content_zh.stem: Read the passage: First, Mia woke up. Next, she brushed her teeth. Then, she ate breakfast. What did Mia do right after she woke up?

questions.explanation_en: The passage says 'First, Mia woke up. Next, she brushed her teeth.' So brushing teeth came right after waking up.
questions.explanation_zh: The passage says 'First, Mia woke up. Next, she brushed her teeth.' So brushing teeth came right after waking up.
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-104 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)

questions.subject: english

content_en.stem: Read the passage: Tom and his sister Lily went to the pond. Lily saw a frog. She was so happy! Who saw the frog?

content_zh.stem: Read the passage: Tom and his sister Lily went to the pond. Lily saw a frog. She was so happy! Who saw the frog?

questions.explanation_en: The passage says 'Lily saw a frog.' Lily is the one who saw it.
questions.explanation_zh: The passage says 'Lily saw a frog.' Lily is the one who saw it.
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-105 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)

questions.subject: english

content_en.stem: A book cover shows the words 'The Big Red Truck' at the top and 'By Amy Lee' at the bottom. What is the title of the book?

content_zh.stem: A book cover shows the words 'The Big Red Truck' at the top and 'By Amy Lee' at the bottom. What is the title of the book?

questions.explanation_en: The title of a book is the name at the top of the cover. 'The Big Red Truck' is the title. 'Amy Lee' is the author.
questions.explanation_zh: The title of a book is the name at the top of the cover. 'The Big Red Truck' is the title. 'Amy Lee' is the author.
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-106 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)

questions.subject: english

content_en.stem: Read the passage: Emma watched the big rocket go up, up, up into the sky! She clapped her hands. 'Wow!' she said. The rocket flew so fast! What does the word 'fast' mean?

content_zh.stem: Read the passage: Emma watched the big rocket go up, up, up into the sky! She clapped her hands. 'Wow!' she said. The rocket flew so fast! What does the word 'fast' mean?

questions.explanation_en: Fast means quick or moving with high speed. The rocket went up very quickly.
questions.explanation_zh: Fast means quick or moving with high speed. The rocket went up very quickly.
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-107 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)

questions.subject: english

content_en.stem: A picture shows a child with an umbrella and rain falling. What is the weather like in the picture?

content_zh.stem: A picture shows a child with an umbrella and rain falling. What is the weather like in the picture?

questions.explanation_en: The picture shows rain falling and a child holding an umbrella, which means the weather is rainy.
questions.explanation_zh: The picture shows rain falling and a child holding an umbrella, which means the weather is rainy.
questions.source_detail: MAP-style question K1-READ-108 (TestPrep-Online seed + AI expansion)
